description: Manage Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL firewall rules.

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres firewall-rule create
commands.summary: Create a new cluster firewall rule or updates an existing cluster firewall rule.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb postgres firewall-rule create --cluster-name
                                          --end-ip-address
                                          --firewall-rule-name
                                          --resource-group
                                          --start-ip-address
                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres firewall-rule delete
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb postgres firewall-rule delete [--cluster-name]
                                          [--firewall-rule-name]
                                          [--ids]
                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--resource-group]
                                          [--subscription]
                                          [--yes]

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres firewall-rule list
commands.summary: List all the firewall rules on cluster.

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres firewall-rule show
commands.summary: Get information about a cluster firewall rule.

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres firewall-rule update
commands.summary: Update an existing cluster firewall rule.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb postgres firewall-rule update [--add]
                                          [--cluster-name]
                                          [--end-ip-address]
                                          [--firewall-rule-name]
                                          [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--ids]
                                          [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                          [--remove]
                                          [--resource-group]
                                          [--set]
                                          [--start-ip-address]
                                          [--subscription]

commands.name: az cosmosdb postgres firewall-rule wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
